name: Benzpyrene,NADPH:oxygen oxidoreductase (RH-hydroxylating or -epoxidizing)
definition: Benzo[a]pyrene + NADPH + Oxygen + H+ <=> Benzo[a]pyrene-7,8-oxide + NADP+ + H2O

pathways.rn00980: Metabolism of xenobiotics by cytochrome P450

orthologs.K07410: cytochrome P450 family 1 subfamily B polypeptide 1 [EC:1.14.14.1]
